body.p: Covington, Kentucky, carriage maker. Washington, D. C. native. Son of Nodley Moreland and Christine Moreland. Married to Elizabeth Moreland. Father of Eleanor Moreland, Louis Moreland, and Charles Moreland. Carriage maker in Covington in 1860.
